name: Lets Ride Santa Sleigh
description:
Lets Ride Santa Sleigh

Santa run is an exciting game that will make you keep coming back.

This addicting and challenging game play goes on forever to meet your entertainment needs. The family and kids will love it!

Take Santa on an adventure run and help him cover a huge distance. Jump over obstacles and collect lives as you run, jump and dodge.

There are different obstacles that makes your run even more interesting. So WATCH OUT!

Crazy Santa life chances are limited so cover the maximum distance as quickly as possible and set a new record on the global game center leader board.

FEATURES:
Beautiful retina graphics! Looks AMAZING on iPhone's.
Use intuitive touch gestures to guide Crazy Santa
Amazing animations and sounds..
Enjoyy...!! 3237627f33
